name: Fatal Cash
description:
Fatal Cash is a game placed in the old Nokia 3310 world and is about collecting coins and cash without getting hit by spawning lasers. XP plays a big role in the game as it is both your HP and level up system. This game is a submission to the Nokia 3310 annual GameJam and is made in the following restrictions:

  1.  The game must use only 2 colors (#c7f0d8 and #43523d)
  2. The base resolution is 84x48 (in this case, upscaled to 840x480)
  3. The game uses only 9 controls (WASD, or alternatively arrow keys, and enter)
  4. The game uses only sounds Nokia 3310 could play with no overlapping ones
  5. All art and code assets were made during the jam, and for the music, I used existing Nokia 3310 ringtones
  6. No subpixel movement is present

Instructions:

WASD or arrow keys to move and navigate the menu, and enter to click the button. Occasionally, coins and cash will spawn that you have to collect to get more XP. You level up when you reach 200 XP. At different levels, you reach different stages that have upgraded spawn rates. These happen:

  1. When you reach level 1
  2. When you reach level 5
  3. When you reach level 10

The game is over when you get to the level 20. Be careful, as lasers remove 50 XP when touched, and when you reach 0 XP, you die.
